function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases may spread if people gather in close proximity to study the schematics together.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission leading to potential outbreaks and illness.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures and limit the number of people in close proximity during study sessions.","Technologies":"Use video conferencing or virtual collaboration tools to study the schematics remotely.","People":"Students, researchers, and professionals studying the schematics together.","Owner":"Educational institutions, research organizations, and employers of professionals."}]}
